prime check

Parameters:
m - - the number to be checked.
Returns:
: if m is prime then @return = true; if m is not prime, @return = false with probability larger then 0.5

generateKey

public static Key[] generateKey()
This function generate a public and private key

Returns:
an array of keys of size 2
on the first cell there is a private key (lambda,mu,n)
on the second cell there is a public key (n,g)
